Text: well, thanks... you are a blessing for poor plebs like me.. hugely appreciated... cheers mate.
also,i dont want to be a pest but- do you know of mitch byrd?... i have all of his sketch books and jaguar god. he is amazing...check it  if you ever run out of things to look at....

poor plebs like you and me both! i had forgotten all about mitch byrd, years ago he was the artist on cat & mouse. i used to own a few issues of that.

wow aircel comics! aircel is long-gone and almost forgotten, but it left its mark on the industry by giving dale keown and lowell cunningham their first breaks!
